sentences.english: XiuZhi blame hermione dont call back, XiuZhi mother to her advice.
sentences.chinese: 秀芝埋怨赫民不回电话，秀芝妈妈给她出主意。

sentences.english: Find rioux complains to the south, drink got wasted.
sentences.chinese: 向南找丁原埋怨，喝得大醉。

sentences.english: He complained in a querulous voice about having been woken up.
sentences.chinese: 他用不耐烦的声音埋怨别人吵醒了他。

sentences.english: If you, you will also complain about the unfair fate of it?
sentences.chinese: 如果是你，你还会埋怨命运的不公吗？

sentences.english: He kept rabbiting (on) about the poor pay.
Weeping and wailing should follow, and beatings are borne without complaint.
sentences.chinese: 再跟着下来就是号哭，就算被鞭挞也不埋怨。

sentences.english: It does no good for you to repine at your unhappy lot.
sentences.chinese: 你埋怨自己命苦是没有用的。

sentences.english: If this is not his wife will continue to blame the wrong married her husband.
sentences.chinese: 如果做不到这一点，妻子就会不断地埋怨错嫁了丈夫。

sentences.english: The tone was bitter and accusatory.
sentences.chinese: 语调是埋怨责怪的那种。

sentences.english: A bad stayman usually blames his tools.
sentences.chinese: 一个不好的工匠常常埋怨他的工具。

sentences.english: The landlord took a toolkit down and tried to pry the nails out when groaning at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 房东从楼上拿了一把工具下来，一边撬铁钉一边埋怨。

sentences.english: Shaking with lee mother angry blame dong-qing li to find a tartar.
sentences.chinese: 李母气的直哆嗦，埋怨李冬青找回来个泼妇。
不要道歉，也不要埋怨谁，都是命。
我那十三岁的女儿嘀咕埋怨。

sentences.english: Grousing is just part of working.
sentences.chinese: 牢骚埋怨只是劳动过程的一部分。

sentences.english: It's useless of grousing me in such a situation, let's do something to turn the tables.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个情形埋怨我也没用，我们一起来扭转局面吧。

definition: to complain/to grumble/to harbor a complaint/to feel dissatisfied
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
to resent/to harbor a grudge against/to loathe/resentment/rancor
